dialogue: Topper, you've accomplished nothing this year.
I'm the greatest employee this world has ever seen!
You have literally done nothing useful for a year.
And I've done far less than anyone.
I thought I heard an animal trapped in my car's engine.
Did you do less than Wally?
Maybe we could continue this talk when he's not in the office.
Any time before 11 a.m. is usually good.
